name: Exit (DEMO)
description:
* THIS IS A SHORT PLAYABLE DEMO THAT MAY CONTAIN BUGS! FEATURES WILL BE MISSING SUCH AS OPTIONS AND SAVE GAME FUNCTIONS. THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT IN DOWNLOADING THIS DEMO. FEEDBACK IS WELCOME IN THE COMMENTS PLEASE ENJOY*

You work for a government facility called "Intertech". The companys goal is to send a living human into Limbo. You are the first living human to successfully enter the gate into the unknown world of limbo but something is not right. The world looks the same just a darker colder version where rooms will change and strange creature like noises can be heard! Find the exit and find your way back to the real world before it's too late. 

(© MichaelSchade-2020-)
